Name: M 149 - Transfer City funds between various agencies in Fiscal 2025 to implement changes to the City’s expense budget, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the New York City Charter. (MN-7).
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE MODIFICATION (MN-7) OF THE FISCAL 2025 EXPENSE BUDGET TO TRANSFER CITY FUNDS BETWEEN AGENCIES AS PROPOSED BY THE MAYOR PURSUANT TO SECTION 107(b) OF THE NEW YORK CITY CHARTER.

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.

Text:
Whereas, At a meeting of the Committee on Finance of the City Council of the City of New York (the "City Council") on June 30, 2025, the Committee on Finance considered a communication, dated June 30, 2025, from the Office of Management and Budget of the Mayor of The City of New York (the "Mayor"), of a proposed request, attached hereto as Exhibit "1" (the "Modification" or "MN-7"), to transfer city funds in the amount of $1.29 billion in the Fiscal 2025 expense budget as adopted by the Council on June 30, 2024, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the Charter of the City of New York (the "Charter"); and 

	Whereas, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the Charter, the City Council has thirty (30) days after the first stated meeting of the City Council following such receipt within which to act upon the Modification;

	NOW, THEREFORE, The Council of The City of New York hereby resolves as follows:

1.  Approval of Modification.  The City Council hereby approves, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the Charter, the actions proposed by the Mayor as set forth in the Modification.

	2.  Effective Date.  This resolution shall take effect as of the date hereof.



I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true and complete copy of a resolution adopted by the Council of the City of New York on this 30th day of June, 2025 on file in this office.

				
		                                                               
                                           _____________________________
	Clerk of the Council of The City 					of New York
